alert.note: Alert for Nolan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nolan and west central Taylor Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Sweetwater, or near Sweetwater. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Roscoe, Maryneal, The Intersection Of Highway 70 And Ranch Road 53, Lake Sweetwater and Camp Boothe Oaks. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 236 and 253. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
